bibl.title: with a chapter by Walter E.H. COCKLE, an Appendix by Duncan R. HOOK and Paul T. CRADDOCK and illustrations by several authors, A Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum. IV: Lamps of Metal and Stone, and Lampstands.
bibl.note: I: 1975; - II: 1980; - III: 1988. - Pp. 1-2: Chapter One. Two Bronze Lamps with Greek Inscriptions, by W.E.H. COCKLE: 1. Q 3682. Dedication to the god Dusares. Wadi Feiran (Sinai), first cent. B.C-first cent. A.D.; - 2. Q 3709. Owner's inscription. Psiathous (near Hermonthis), about A.D. 50-130. - Pp. 125-140: Addendum to Volumes I to III. - Pp. 141-143: Corrections and Notes to Volumes I to III. - Pp. 180-182: Index of Find-Spots and Alleged Proveniences.
bibl.seg: BAILEY Donald M., with a chapter by Walter E.H. COCKLE, an Appendix by Duncan R. HOOK and Paul T. CRADDOCK and illustrations by several authors, A Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum. IV: Lamps of Metal and Stone, and Lampstands.
London, British Museum, 1996, 4°, xiii-192 pp., 1 front., graphiques et 192 pll. ISBN 0-7141-2206-8. £70.

I: 1975; - II: 1980; - III: 1988. - Pp. 1-2: Chapter One. Two Bronze Lamps with Greek Inscriptions, by W.E.H. COCKLE: 1. Q 3682. Dedication to the god Dusares. Wadi Feiran (Sinai), first cent. B.C-first cent. A.D.; - 2. Q 3709. Owner's inscription. Psiathous (near Hermonthis), about A.D. 50-130. - Pp. 125-140: Addendum to Volumes I to III. - Pp. 141-143: Corrections and Notes to Volumes I to III. - Pp. 180-182: Index of Find-Spots and Alleged Proveniences.
